item.title: UC Merced Library visit
item.dc:creator: Jill Barr-Walker
item.description:
Continuing our tradition of LAUC-sponsored library visits, a group of nine brave travelers made the 3 hour trek to UC Merced Library. We had a wonderful time meeting our Merced colleagues, being inspired by new ideas for spaces and services, and experiencing a staff-led tour of the campus Vernal Pools ...

item.title: UC Santa Cruz Library visit
item.dc:creator: Jill Barr-Walker
item.description:
For our 5th LAUC library visit, and my final as LAUC chair, we visited UC Santa Cruz. We had a fantastic time meeting our SC colleagues, getting new ideas for spaces and services, learning about the work that goes into their incredible special collections exhibits, and experiencing the local flora ...

item.title: Visit to SFPL
item.dc:creator: Jill Barr-Walker
item.description:
Thanks to everyone who joined our SFPL tour yesterday! Dee Dee led us through 7 floors of amazing collections including two art galleries, countless exhibits, and a few other highlights pictured below: Dee Dee’s new space, the James C. Hormel LGBTQIA Center, currently featuring art by the Degenderettes Bonus: Rachel’s ...

item.title: Visit to Berkeley Libraries
item.dc:creator: Jill Barr-Walker
item.description:
Last week, as part of a LAUC SF-organized initiative, UCSF Library staff visited UC Berkeley Libraries to meet colleagues, learn more about library services and spaces, and share ideas. Six intrepid library staff members braved Muni, BART, and surprisingly long walks across the beautiful Berkeley campus to four libraries. We ...

Read moreVisit to Berkeley Libraries

item.title: Celebrating National Medical Librarians Month at ZSFG!
item.dc:creator: Jill Barr-Walker
item.description:
ZSFG Library held 5 events last week for National Medical Librarians Month– we received 200+ attendees over the week! Thanks to Iesha, Dylan, and Griffin who helped spread the word about our library & archives services to clinicians, researchers, and staff at ZSFG! (And special thanks to Ned who staffed ...

item.title: MLA webinar at ZSFG Library next week
item.dc:creator: Jill Barr-Walker
item.description:
We’re hosting the MLA webinar “Beyond Systematic: The Librarian’s Role in Shaping Reviews” at ZSFG Library on December 7 from 11-12:30. Registration is open to everyone.  Please register if you’re going to come or if you’re interested in getting a link to the recorded sessions. Register here. More information about ...
